text: Tomaloke allahara ibadata karaa, arau te'omra lagata ana kako ansidara sthapana nakaraiba; lagate pitr-matr arau atmiya-sbajana, iyatima, abharagrasta, nikata pratiraesi, dura-pratiraesi, sangi-sarathi, muchaphira arau tomalokara adhikarabhukta dasa-dasisakalara prati sadbyarahara karaa. Niscaya allahe dambhika, ahankaraika pachanda nakarae
